subInfotuition: Tuition fees will be updated continuously every month
subListOfPeoplePickup: Authorized person to pick up and drop off children on behalf of the guardian
bannerTitle: WEB APP DIGITAL CONVERSION OF PRESCHOOLS
bannerLogan: Bringing value to the community, contributing to socio-economic development.
rapidProgressDes: Children will experience hands-on and learning activities every day.
connectWithManyFriendsDes: When children learn to play with many friends, they will feel happier.
excellentTeacherDes: Our teachers are always excellent teachers with master's degrees or higher.
weeklyProgramDes: The curriculum is designed to suit each age group, children learn in an environment that encourages creativity, focusing on personal care and development as well as each child's unique abilities.
weeklyMenuDes: The menu is checked and approved by a nutritionist. Food prepared at school ensures nutrition, hygiene and the diet is designed to suit the needs of each child.
photoLibaryDes: Images of AFO Kindergarten's activities, cute and funny perspectives of the children in school activities, marking memories at the beloved school.
videoClips: Clips of AFO Kindergarten activities, cute and funny perspectives of children in school activities, recording memories at the beloved school.
weeklyActivitiesDes: Activities are designed to suit each age group, children work in an environment that encourages creativity, focusing on personal care and development as well as each child's different abilities.
documentSub: Learning materials of AFO Kindergarten, children's drawing exercises during class.
